statements: SELECT * FROM keyword_performance;
SELECT keyword, clicks, cost FROM keyword_performance WHERE campaign_id = 12345;
SELECT campaign_id, keyword, impressions, clicks, cost, conversions FROM keyword_performance WHERE conversions > 5;
SELECT * FROM keyword_performance ORDER BY clicks DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, keyword, cost FROM keyword_performance WHERE impressions >= 100 AND conversions = 0;
SELECT keyword, impressions, clicks FROM keyword_performance WHERE campaign_id = 1234;
SELECT * FROM keyword_performance WHERE conversions > 5 ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, keyword, sum(clicks) AS total_clicks FROM keyword_performance WHERE impressions > 100 GROUP BY campaign_id, keyword;
SELECT AVG(conversions) AS avg_conversions, MIN(cost) AS min_cost, MAX(impressions) AS max_impressions FROM keyword_performance WHERE campaign_id IN (5678, 9876);
SELECT DISTINCT keyword FROM keyword_performance WHERE clicks > 50 ORDER BY impressions ASC, cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM Keyword_Performance ORDER BY keyword_name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT keyword_name, clicks, impressions FROM Keyword_Performance WHERE spend > 100 ORDER BY impressions DESC;
SELECT keyword_name, clicks, spend FROM Keyword_Performance WHERE clicks > 50 AND impressions < 500 ORDER BY clicks DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(ad_spend) AS total_spend FROM Ad_Spend GROUP BY campaign_id HAVING total_spend > 1000 ORDER BY total_spend DESC;
SELECT keyword_name, impressions, spend FROM Keyword_Performance WHERE impressions > 1000 ORDER BY spend ASC;
SELECT keyword_id, keyword_name, clicks FROM Keyword_Performance ORDER BY clicks DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT keyword_name, impressions FROM Keyword_Performance WHERE impressions > 1000;
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(spend) AS total_spend FROM Keyword_Performance GROUP BY campaign_id HAVING total_spend > 500;
SELECT keyword_name, ad_name, ad_spend FROM Keyword_Performance JOIN Ad_Spend ON Keyword_Performance.campaign_id = Ad_Spend.campaign_id WHERE ad_spend > 1000;
SELECT campaign_id, COUNT(*) AS num_keywords FROM Keyword_Performance GROUP BY campaign_id ORDER BY num_keywords DESC;
SELECT * FROM keyword_performance ORDER BY keyword_id DESC;
SELECT keyword, clicks FROM keyword_performance WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaign;
SELECT SUM(ad_spend) AS total_spent FROM keyword_performance WHERE clicks > 100;
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(spent) AS total_spent FROM ad_spend_tracking GROUP BY campaign_id HAVING total_spent > 500;
SELECT keyword, clicks, impressions FROM keyword_performance WHERE clicks > 100 ORDER BY impressions DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaign WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM keyword_performance WHERE ad_spend > 5000 AND clicks >= 50 ORDER BY ad_spend DESC, clicks DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, SUM(spent) AS total_spent FROM campaign JOIN ad_spend_tracking ON campaign.campaign_id = ad_spend_tracking.campaign_id GROUP BY campaign_name, start_date;

SELECT keyword, campaign_name, ad_spend FROM keyword_performance JOIN campaign ON keyword_performance.campaign_id = campaign.campaign_id WHERE ad_spend BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY ad_spend ASC, keyword ASC;
SELECT * FROM keyword_performance WHERE keyword_id = 1;
SELECT keyword_name, clicks, conversions FROM keyword_performance WHERE impressions > 1000;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT ad_text, cost FROM ads ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT ad_group_name, campaign_id, max_bid FROM ad_groups WHERE status = 'enabled';
SELECT * FROM keyword_performance WHERE clicks > 100 AND impressions < 1000
SELECT keyword_id, keyword_name, conversions FROM keyword_performance WHERE conversions >= 5 ORDER BY conversions DESC
SELECT keyword_name, campaign_name, clicks, impressions FROM keyword_performance INNER JOIN campaigns ON keyword_performance.campaign_id = campaigns.campaign_id
SELECT ad_text, cost FROM ads WHERE cost BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY cost
SELECT ad_group_id, ad_group_name, max_bid, status FROM ad_groups WHERE status = 'Active'
SELECT * FROM keyword_campaigns;
SELECT id, keyword, campaign_name FROM keyword_campaigns WHERE clicks > 100;
SELECT campaign_name, impressions FROM keyword_campaigns WHERE cost < 50.00 ORDER BY impressions DESC;
SELECT ad_group_name, ad_text FROM ad_groups JOIN ads ON ad_groups.id = ads.ad_group_id WHERE clicks < 50 ORDER BY ad_group_name ASC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM keyword_campaigns WHERE clicks > 100 ORDER BY impressions DESC;
SELECT ad_name, clicks, cost FROM ads WHERE impressions < 500 GROUP BY ad_name HAVING clicks > 50;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%john%' AND email LIKE '%example.com%';
SELECT campaign_name, SUM(clicks), SUM(impressions) FROM keyword_campaigns GROUP BY campaign_name ORDER BY SUM(clicks) DESC;
SELECT ad_group_name, AVG(cost) AS avg_cost FROM ad_groups JOIN ads ON ad_groups.id = ads.ad_group_id GROUP BY ad_group_name HAVING avg_cost < 50 ORDER BY avg_cost ASC;
